name: fentseller.lol
description: The site you are currently on is my biggest project as of right now.(Domain gifted by saif)

name: Guestbook
description: A custom frontend for a SmartGuestBook, which uses a CORS Proxy to fetch the guestbook entries.

name: ZyMusic
description: A fork of ViMusic that includes more colors. (Very, very unfinished however; YouTube/Google added an anti-bot protection addition that broke it.)

name: ZyMusic 2
description: A fork of ViTune (fork of ViMusic) that includes more colors.

name: Unexpected Keyboard
description: A fork of Unexpected Keyboard that includes more colors, just like ZyMusic.

name: MyWig
description: An app with Flashcards; more widgets coming soon. Name means 'MyWidget'.

name: Pickaxes
description: Mod that adds some pickaxes, blocks and other items. Still in development

name: AutoClicker
description: An AutoClicker written in C# using the MouseKeyHook Library.

name: Bio
description: A site about me with a music player. Donate Crypto to keep this site up!

description: Here are all of my GitHub repositories, where you can fork, star, and open issues (if needed).
